entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
